price: 6. Maka tidakkah mereka memperhatikan langit yang ada di atas mereka, bagaimana cara Kami membangunnya dan menghiasinya, dan tidak terdapat retak-retak sedikit pun?
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَيۡفَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٖ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afalam yanẓurū ilā al-samāi fawqahum kayfa banaynāhā wazayyannāhā wamā lahā min furūjin
